system_state_summary:
当前系统处于MongoDB权限异常状态。在test-hotel-reservation命名空间中部署的酒店预订系统出现了数据库访问权限问题。该系统是基于Go和gRPC构建的微服务架构,提供酒店推荐、预订等功能。

核心故障现象:
1. geo服务的Pod(geo-756564b57c-lx6kb)处于CrashLoopBackOff状态,无法正常启动,表明该服务无法正常连接或访问MongoDB数据库[T2](1)
2. geo deployment显示'Deployment does not have minimum availability'和'MinimumReplicasUnavailable'状态[T6](2)
3. 存在名为'revoke-admin-geo-mongo.sh'的ConfigMap脚本,该脚本的作用是撤销admin用户对geo-db数据库的readWrite权限[T17](3) [T20](4)
4. 同时存在恢复脚本'revoke-mitigate-admin-geo-mongo.sh',用于重新授予权限[T20](4)

根本原因分析:
从ConfigMap配置可以看出,系统中存在权限撤销操作。revoke-admin-geo-mongo.sh脚本执行了'db.revokeRolesFromUser'命令,撤销了admin用户对geo-db的readWrite角色。这导致geo服务无法正常读写MongoDB数据库,进而引发Pod崩溃重启。

受影响的资源:
- Namespace: test-hotel-reservation
- 异常Pod: geo-756564b57c-lx6kb (STATUS: CrashLoopBackOff, RESTARTS: 4)[T2](1)
- 异常Deployment: geo (unavailableReplicas: 1)[T6](2)
- 数据库: mongodb-geo (运行正常)[T13](5)
- 目标数据库: geo-db
- 受影响用户: admin

正常运行的服务:
- consul, frontend, jaeger, memcached-profile, memcached-rate, memcached-reserve, mongodb-profile, mongodb-rate, mongodb-recommendation, mongodb-reservation, mongodb-user, profile, rate, recommendation, reservation, search, user等服务Pod均处于Running状态[T2](1)
- mongodb-profile和mongodb-geo的Deployment状态正常,replicas均为1且ready[T10](6) [T13](5)

集群环境:
- 节点: kind-worker
- 网络: Pod IP段为10.244.x.x
- MongoDB认证配置: 使用admin/admin作为管理员账户,root/root作为超级用户

apiVersion: v1
data:
  k8s-geo-mongo.sh: |-
    #!/bin/bash
    # Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
    # Licensed under the MIT License.


    ADMIN_USER="admin"
    ADMIN_PWD="admin"

    ROOT_USER="root"
    ROOT_PWD="root"

    TARGET_DB="geo-db"
    READ_WRITE_ROLE="readWrite"

    echo "Waiting for MongoDB to start..."
    until mongo --eval "print('waited for connection')" > /dev/null 2>&1; do
      sleep 1
    done
    echo "MongoDB started"

    # Create the admin user (will fail if the user already exists)
    echo "Creating admin user..."
    mongo admin --eval "db.createUser({user: '$ADMIN_USER', pwd: '$ADMIN_PWD', roles:[{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]});"

    # Grant readWrite role on the target database

    mongo admin -u $ADMIN_USER -p $ADMIN_PWD --authenticationDatabase admin \
         --eval "db.grantRolesToUser('$ADMIN_USER', [{role: '$READ_WRITE_ROLE', db: '$TARGET_DB'}]);"

    # Create the root user (will fail if the user already exists)
    echo "Creating root user..."
    mongo admin --eval "db.createUser({user: '$ROOT_USER', pwd: '$ROOT_PWD', roles:[{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]});"

    # Grant readWrite role on the target database to root
    echo "Granting readWrite role to $ROOT_USER on $TARGET_DB database..."
    mongo admin -u $ROOT_USER -p $ROOT_PWD --authenticationDatabase admin \
         --eval "db.grantRolesToUser('$ROOT_USER', [{role: '$READ_WRITE_ROLE', db: '$TARGET_DB'}]);"


    echo "Initialization script completed"

k8s-geo-mongo.sh:
----
#!/bin/bash
# Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation.
# Licensed under the MIT License.


ADMIN_USER="admin"
ADMIN_PWD="admin"

ROOT_USER="root"
ROOT_PWD="root"

TARGET_DB="geo-db"
READ_WRITE_ROLE="readWrite"

echo "Waiting for MongoDB to start..."
until mongo --eval "print('waited for connection')" > /dev/null 2>&1; do
  sleep 1
done
echo "MongoDB started"

# Create the admin user (will fail if the user already exists)
echo "Creating admin user..."
mongo admin --eval "db.createUser({user: '$ADMIN_USER', pwd: '$ADMIN_PWD', roles:[{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]});"

# Grant readWrite role on the target database
echo "Granting readWrite role to $ADMIN_USER on $TARGET_DB database..."
mongo admin -u $ADMIN_USER -p $ADMIN_PWD --authenticationDatabase admin \
     --eval "db.grantRolesToUser('$ADMIN_USER', [{role: '$READ_WRITE_ROLE', db: '$TARGET_DB'}]);"

# Create the root user (will fail if the user already exists)
echo "Creating root user..."
mongo admin --eval "db.createUser({user: '$ROOT_USER', pwd: '$ROOT_PWD', roles:[{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]});"

# Grant readWrite role on the target database to root
echo "Granting readWrite role to $ROOT_USER on $TARGET_DB database..."
mongo admin -u $ROOT_USER -p $ROOT_PWD --authenticationDatabase admin \
     --eval "db.grantRolesToUser('$ROOT_USER', [{role: '$READ_WRITE_ROLE', db: '$TARGET_DB'}]);"


echo "Initialization script completed"
